  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.contento.se:112577</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CFL</catalog>
            <entry>112577</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">The Kitchen - Words 2</string>
            <string language="en">The Kitchen - Words 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Küche - Wörter 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Cuisine - Mots 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Cozinha - Palavras 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Cucina - Parole 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κουζίνα - λέξεις 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Cocina - Palabras 2</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Here you can check if you learned all the kitchen words that you worked with in the exercise The Kitchen - Words 1.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 4 - How Do You Live?</string>
            <string language="en">Here you can check if you learned all the kitchen words that you worked with in the exercise The Kitchen - Words 1. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 4 - How Do You Live?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">living</string>
            <string language="sv">kitchen</string>
            <string language="sv">housing</string>
            <string language="sv">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">living</string>
            <string language="en">kitchen</string>
            <string language="en">housing</string>
            <string language="en">word knowledge</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier können Sie überprüfen, ob Sie alle 
Küchewörter erlernten, denen Sie mit in der Übung die Küche - 
Wörter 1 bearbeiteten. Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben für 
Anfänger - Modul 4 - wie leben Sie?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voici que vous pouvez contrôler si vous appreniez 
tous les mots de cuisine que vous avez travaillé avec dans l'exercice
la cuisine - les mots 1. Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour 
des débutants - module 4 - comment vivez-vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui você pode verificar se você aprender todas 
as palavras da cozinha que você trabalhou com no exercício a cozinha
- palavras 1. Safir - vida do inglês e de funcionamento para 
novatos - módulo 4 - como você vive?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui potete controllare se imparaste tutte le parole
della cucina che avete lavorato con nell'esercitazione la cucina - le 
parole 1. Safir - inglese e vita attiva per i principianti - 
modulo 4 - come vivete?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ μπορείτε να ελέγξετε εάν μάθατε όλες τις λέξεις
κουζινών με τις οποίες εσείς απασχοληθήκατε στην άσκηση στην 
κουζίνα - Words 1. Safir - αγγλικά και οικονομικά ενεργή 
ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 4 - πώς ζείτε;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí usted puede controlar si usted aprendió 
todas las palabras de la cocina que usted trabajó con en el ejercicio
la cocina - palabras 1. ¿Safir - inglés y vida laboral para los
principiantes - módulo 4 - cómo usted vive?</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
